snippet.title: Rob Riches Now Available!
snippet.description:
Finally, Rob Riches, a thrilling puzzle adventure game is now available on Steam PC, Google Play and the App Store.

Don't miss the adventure at:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1655670/Rob_Riches/
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.Megapop.RobRiches&hl=en&gl=US
https://apps.apple.com/us/app/rob-riches/id1572821486

"You are Rob Riches, fearless adventurer and treasure hunter. Plan your steps carefully as you traverse ancient temples filled to the brim with dangerous traps and mysterious puzzles."
